channel.title: Create a darkness effect?
channel.description: Was wondering if anyone knew how to make a darkness effect Either with a screen overlay(like snow effect) or with brightness, I've tried this, but it doesn't work, not sure why... [code] int a = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); server.playerHandler.players[a].brightness = 1;[/code]

item.title: Create a darkness effect?
item.dc:creator: @Burning_fangs Burning fangs
item.description:
@Burning_fangs wrote:

Was wondering if anyone knew how to make a darkness effect
Either with a screen overlay(like snow effect)
or with brightness,
I’ve tried this, but it doesn’t work, not sure why…

int a = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); server.playerHandler.players[a].brightness = 1;

Read full topic
